text: WXBJ-LP (94.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Salisbury, Massachusetts. The station is owned by Good Neighbor Station Inc. It airs an oldies format. The station was assigned the WXBJ-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 10, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * XBJ-LP XBJ-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Massachusetts Category:Oldies radio stations in the United States Category:Essex County, Massachusetts
title: WXBJ-LP
